mapper.select: SELECT TUP.ID, UPCYCLING_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_DETAIL_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_EMAIL, UPCYCLING_PHONE, UPCYCLING_DATE, UPCYCLING_SIZE_SMALL, UPCYCLING_SIZE_MEDIUM, UPCYCLING_SIZE_LARGE, UPCYCLING_MATERIALS, UPCYCLING_IMG_NAME, UPCYCLING_IMG_PATH, UPCYCLING_SIGNIFICANT, UPCYCLING_STATUS, TUS.ID AS USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL FROM TBL_UPCYCLING TUP JOIN TBL_USER TUS ON TUP.USER_ID = TUS.ID WHERE TUP.UPCYCLING_STATUS = '미신청' ORDER BY TUP.UPCYCLING_DATE DESC

SELECT TUP.ID, UPCYCLING_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_DETAIL_ADDRESS, UPCYCLING_EMAIL, UPCYCLING_PHONE, UPCYCLING_DATE, UPCYCLING_SIZE_SMALL, UPCYCLING_SIZE_MEDIUM, UPCYCLING_SIZE_LARGE, UPCYCLING_MATERIALS, UPCYCLING_IMG_NAME, UPCYCLING_IMG_PATH, UPCYCLING_SIGNIFICANT, UPCYCLING_STATUS, TUS.ID AS USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL FROM TBL_UPCYCLING TUP JOIN TBL_USER TUS ON TUP.USER_ID = TUS.ID WHERE TUP.ID = #{id}
